Cards.Title: Pilot
Cards.Text: The Mayans burn down your gun warehouse. Gain 2 heat, you cannot sell guns.
Cards.FlavorText: Two in the back of the head. Quick and painless

Cards.Title: Seeds
Cards.Text: Deputy chief David Hale investigates the warehouse explosion. Every time you exploit for guns, gain 1 heat.
Cards.FlavorText: Those two dead Mexicans in the warehouse hole. I was hitting them.

Cards.Title: Fun Town
Cards.Text: Elliot Oswald's daughter has been raped by a carny. If you commit 3 members to finding the rapist, keep this as a favour.
Cards.FlavorText: We'll find the sick bastard.

Cards.Title: Patch Over
Cards.Text: Commit 3 dudes to patch over the Devil's Tribe and fight 3 mayans. If you win, gain 2 members and 1 prospect.
Cards.FlavorText: I'm gonna dunk my balls in your mouth. You're gonna gag. I'm gonna laugh. We'll be best friends forever.

Cards.Title: Giving back
Cards.Text: Gemma hosts a town fundraiser. Commit 3 dudes to gain the town's favour.
Cards.FlavorText: You know that fried shit's gonna kill you?

Cards.Title: AK-51
Cards.Text: Nate Meineke ambushes a prison convoy and kills 3 people with your guns. Gain 2 heat and lose 3 weapons.
Cards.FlavorText: You so much as flash a pretty grin at him, I will jam my fist so far up your bony ass, your cup size will double.

Cards.Title: Half Sack, Full Punch
Cards.Text: Half Sack competes in a bare-knuckle box fight. You can bet up to $5 and roll a D6. Double your bet on a 4 or higher.
Cards.FlavorText: Go on, get out of here, before I rape both of you.

Cards.Title: The Pull
Cards.Text: Commit 3 members to steal back a tanker from the Nords to gain $4. Then you may pay $4 to get 4 guns from the Irish.
Cards.FlavorText: Why am I looking at one of Oswald's tanker's?

Cards.Title: Hell Followed
Cards.Text: Jax killed Agent Kohn and has to get rid of the body. Lose 1 order. You also can't patch in and recruit.
Cards.FlavorText: Blood came in every shade of life.

Cards.Title: Better Half
Cards.Text: ATF raids Caracara. You cannot skim money from any location.
Cards.FlavorText: I'm gonna bury these assholes.

Cards.Title: Capybara
Cards.Text: Bobby is arrested for Brian Hefner's murder. At the same time Opie is held by the FEDs. Put two members in prison.
Cards.FlavorText: He'd never sell out the club.

Cards.Title: The Sleep of Babies
Cards.Text: Opie's wife Donna is shot by Tig. Lose 1 member and 1 gun.
Cards.FlavorText: Let me borrow your cell. I got to check in with Donna.

Cards.Title: The Revelator
Cards.Text: Piney wants to take revenge for Donna's death. Commit 2 dudes (1+ members) or lose 1 member and 1 prospect.
Cards.FlavorText: The Niners came gunning for my son. They killed my daughter-in-law.

Cards.Title: Albification
Cards.Text: Gemma gets gang raped by AJ Weston and his associates. To cover it up she crashes her car. Lose $5.
Cards.FlavorText: So why don't you just climb back into your little German clown car and drive back to Nazi town...

Cards.Title: Small Tears
Cards.Text: Georgie Caruso is threatening the girls at Caracara into working for him. Fight 3 of his henchmen or lose $7.
Cards.FlavorText: This one here's got kind of a Brad Pit thing going only not quite as gay.

Cards.Title: Fix
Cards.Text: Darby is cooking meth for Zobelle in a lab in the woods. Commit 3 dudes (2+ members) to blow up the lab to steal 3 contraband and gain 1 heat.
Cards.FlavorText: Are you talking about deliberately bringing drugs into my town?

Cards.Title: Eureka
Cards.Text: Tig gets kidnapped by bounty hunters for an outstanding warrant. Fight 2 bounty hunters or lose 1 member.
Cards.FlavorText: What are you hittin' me for? I was cooperatin'.

Cards.Title: Smite
Cards.Text: Chibs prepares to move a minivan but a bomb goes off. Put 1 member in hospital, lose $1 and gain 1 heat.
Cards.FlavorText: When relationships become a ledger of profit and loss, you have no friends, no loved ones, just pluses and minuses.

Cards.Title: Falx Cerebri
Cards.Text: SAMCRO mobilizes to attack Zobelle at a MCC meeting. The room is filled with Christian families and the Sheriffs arrest 3 dudes (2+ members).
Cards.FlavorText: You know, I don't give a shit what the plan is. I am tired of sitting here playing 'what happens if?'

Cards.Title: Gilead
Cards.Text: Opie attacks Lyla's drug dealer and takes away all his drugs. Commit 1 member to gain 3 contraband and 1 heat.
Cards.FlavorText: My son, he's given me a new pair of glasses. I find myself thinking about the things I do. Things I say, ramifications.

Cards.Title: Potlatch
Cards.Text: SAMCRO is in a shootout with AB to take the Irish guns. Fight 4 aryans. If you win, gain 4 guns. If you lose, send 4 dudes to the hospital.
Cards.FlavorText: I'm not the one murdering women!

Cards.Title: Fa Guan
Cards.Text: SAMCRO overwhelms judge Franklin, tie him up and threaten to destroy the letters from his wife. Commit 3 dudes to gain this favour.
Cards.FlavorText: You low life junkie piece of shit! Your mother would be disgusted.

Cards.Title: Balm
Cards.Text: SAMCRO finds out that the Indians are making bullets. Commit 3 dudes (1+ members) to gain 5 guns. Send 1 member to the hospital afterwards.
Cards.FlavorText: Good. I can feel it. It wants to cure me. It's cool and warm at the same time. It's coorm!

Cards.Title: Service
Cards.Text: Opie follows Stahl after finding out that she is behind Donna's death. Kill her to lose all heat or show mercy and keep this favour.
Cards.FlavorText: The next time you try to twist the truth, remember that the outlaw had mercy.

Cards.Title: The Culling
Cards.Text: SAMCRO and AB meet up for a fist fight. Send (not commit) all members to fight 5 AB.
Cards.FlavorText: Fair's for losers. I'd rather win.

Cards.Title: Na Trioblóidí
Cards.Text: Cameron kidnaps Abel and brings him to Ireland. Lose 1 member and lose 1 base order until card #37.
Cards.FlavorText: A son for a son seems about right.

Cards.Title: SO
Cards.Text: A drive by happens at Half Sack's wake. Hale gets run over and several innocents are wounded. Lose a favor and send 1 member to jail.
Cards.FlavorText: TODO

Cards.Title: Oiled
Cards.Text: Commit 3 dudes (2+ members) to help bounty hunter Serg to bring in a high risk bounty to gain this favour.
Cards.FlavorText: TODO

Cards.Title: Caregiver
Cards.Text: Henry Lin will only sell you guns if you borrow the Caracara girls to him. You cannot exploit for guns and skim porn sites.
Cards.FlavorText: TODO

Cards.Title: Home
Cards.Text: SAMCRO got involved in a gunfight between a drug dealer and a gong of tweakers. Fight 3 enemies to gain this favour.
Cards.FlavorText: TODO

Cards.Title: Turning and Turning
Cards.Text: Juice meets with the paranoid "Chicken Man" but gets jumped by Salazar and two other Calaveras. Lose 1 member.
Cards.FlavorText: TODO

Cards.Title: The Push
Cards.Text: The Sheriffs raid the SAMCRO clubhouse. Lose all contraband. If you lost any contraband also gain 2 heat.
Cards.FlavorText: TODO
